attributes.review: Was excited to get this so I could have even more information about why we should vote trump 2020 🦋✨on a gravestone 🥳🧚‍♀️ but was extremely disappointed to find out that trump is still president. Please delete this app it’s disgusting.
attributes.title: Disappointing

attributes.review: it took a week to download!! then when i got into the app moto moto showed up on the screen and started dancing!! it scared me so much that i had to delete the app!! can’t believe trump would do this!! 100% would NOT recommend
attributes.title: could do better

attributes.review:
So I downloaded the app and after a minute i was dead but I came back in spirt and deleted the app and came back to life this app is the devil just like have a rapist president please don’t have this app in the apple store the app is worst than watching
 a fridge and a stick dance
attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.review: This app took forever to download and when I opened it, it didn’t even work? Also my phone started glitching like crazy?? I also think I heard breathing coming from my phone like I was being watch. Don’t get this app!!

I tried to use the app to support our president but the app crashed too many times and it won’t even allow me to use the app in general. Overall this app is horrible it deserves a 0 star instead of 1 star.
attributes.title: Not good at all

attributes.review: i got this app to educate myself more on our president. however since getting the app it has been messing with my phone, especially when using the app. it tends to crash, while crashing all the other apps i have used in that five minute time frame. my phone randomly turns off or flashes orange now in usage. i am not very satisfied with the fact the app doesn’t allow me to use my phone, it’s like it took it over.
attributes.title: app messes with my phone

attributes.review: It was absolutely terrible and I will never use it ever again it made my parents go missing and they kidnapped my brother and sued my family for 2 mil know we are homeless and they are still trying to find my parents and brother
attributes.title: TERRIBLE

attributes.review: I decided to download the app and it was just   a very unpleasant experience. The first thing to pop up was the horrendous lags. It’s like if the app should’ve never been made😗✋ I would never recommend this to anyone. It was a foul app overall. Very scary views.
attributes.title: Dreadful app

attributes.review: Hello this is for our  orange looking Oompa Loompa body president. We have COVID 19! We are fighting for equal justice and right now your focus is on banning an app that has inspired many creators. This has changed lives remember your rally. Sorry about that but u know that us Gen Z won’t go down without a fight.

as a middle aged woman, i already have issues with these dang phones. now, the app itself has terrible format, with parts of the app hard to locate. other than that, there’s also terrible crashing problem which has not redeemed itself with previous updates. i also am sorely disappointed in the trump administration for not allowing basic human rights, but that’s a different story.
attributes.title: issue with crashing and overall terrible format
